com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.name: Jetty
com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.content:
[configuration] offset-right = 0 height-units = 3 width-units = 2 entity = ${entity} step-line = false markers = false timespan = 1 day last-value-label = none legend-position = top label-format = tags.id/tags.context statistic = avg step-line = false disconnect-interval = 15 minute
[tags] "type" = hashsessionmanager "context" = * id = *
[group]
[widget] type = chart title = ${entity}: Sessions Count timespan = 1 week period = 1 hour mode = range metric = jmx.jetty.sessions label-format = statistic: period step-line = true color = magenta [series] statistic = min [series] statistic = avg [series] statistic = max
[widget] type = chart timespan = 1 day statistic = detail title = Daily Sessions metric = jmx.jetty.sessions label-format = label [tags] "type" = hashsessionmanager "context" = ROOT id = 0 [series] label = Week Ago time-offset = 1 week color = silver [series] label = Yesterday time-offset = 1 day color = green [series] label = Today #style = stroke-width: 2 color = orange
[group]
[widget] type = chart title = Session Creation Rate/minute rate = 1 minute mode = range [series] metric = jmx.jetty.sessionstotal [series] metric = jmx.jetty.sessionstotal statistic = max
[widget] type = chart title = Session Time [series] metric = jmx.jetty.sessiontimemean
[group]
[widget] type = property title = Properties expand-tags = true transpose = true responsive = false column-entity = null column-time = null join = entity width-units = 1.3 hide-column = column.key.indexOf('sessiontime') >= 0 || column.key.indexOf('sessions') == 0 column-idmanager = null [column] key = started label = Started style = if(typeof value != 'string') return; return (value != 'true') ? 'background-color: red; color: white' : 'color: green; font-weight: bold' [column] key = running label = Running style = if(typeof value != 'string') return; return (value != 'true') ? 'background-color: red; color: white' : 'color: green; font-weight: bold' [column] key = startuptime label = Start Time format = iso
[property] type = jmx.jetty.server [property] type = jmx.jetty.hashsessionmanager
[widget] type = property title = Uptime transpose = true responsive = false column-entity = null column-time = null width-units = 0.7
[column] key = startuptime label = Uptime format = intervalFormat('%dd %Hh:%Mm')(new Date().getTime() - value) alert-expression = value < 60000*60 alert-style = color: orange; font-weight: bold style = font-size: 60px
[property] type = jmx.jetty.server
